name: Hitokiri Kamazo
text: Your Turn Once Per Turn When you return DON!! on your field to your DON!! deck, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's characters of cost 2 or less.

effect.text: When you return DON!! on your field to your DON!! deck, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's characters of cost 2 or less.

meta.notes: Card is a sample image with 'SAMPLE' watermark. Rarity is UC (Uncommon) as indicated by the 'U' and 'C' in the rarity box. Power is 5000 as printed. Counter is +2000.
